pr_title: DROOLS-5148: [DMN Designer] Copy/Paste is not working

timeline.message: Introducing in Stunner a parent type to be used in the @Alternative
DMNDeepCloneProcess should be used, in DMN, in place of DeepCloneProcess by Stunner
DMN deep clone: supporting all DMN nodes, except for Decision
Adding copy as abstract method to be implemented in subclasses of Expression
Adding copy method to Property classes
All subclasses of Expression must implement the copy method
All models used by DMN nodes must implement the copy method
Implementing deep clone core process for DMN nodes

timeline.bodyText: Please implement unit tests for all added copy() methods.
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText: I have implemented unit tests for all added copy() methods.
replies.author: vpellegrino

timeline.bodyText:
Some classes just add new public copy method and some override abstract copy method. Just question if we can not  declare the abstract in DMNModelInstrumentedBase to achieve consistency in overriding?
Just asking, haven't investigated limitations.
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText:
If you see commit history, there is a set of classes that are overriding Expression.copy abstract method, because of boxed expressions.
In other cases, the public copy method is enough for our purposes.
replies.author: vpellegrino

timeline.bodyText: We should add javadoc, explaining deep copy is made.
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText:
This method only represents a contract for all subclasses of Expression.
Its purpose is to exploit polymorphism when we deeply copy the Expression boxed inside the Decision
I will add javadoc also to DMNDeepCloneProcess.clone to explain how deep copy is made
replies.author: vpellegrino

timeline.bodyText:
We miss test for second link:
assertThat(cloned.getLinksHolder().getValue().getLinks())
                .extracting("url")
                .containsExactly(FIRST_URL, SECOND_URL);
Looking on whole class, could we please use both URLs in all tests (where applicable)?
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText: Please add javadoc explaining purpose of this class
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.message: Mockito was not able to mock BindableTypeMock, because it was package private
Adding javadoc to explain better Expression and DMNDeepCloneProcess
All constants in tests should be private
